resources.string: This function will start the Chatbot and connect to the Live Support.
This function will start the Chatbot, connect to the Live Support and along with that it will send a user message(Hello, I am John.).
Instead of connecting to live support, this function will start the bot flow of particular dialog, which can be configured in ChatGen Dashboard.

If you have some user details in your app, and you need to send them to ChatGen, you can use this function. After using this function details will be sent to ChatGen whenever Bot is started.

For example: If you click the below button User's name will be set as John.

Now click on START CHATBOT WITH DIALOG FLOW button You can see the starting message as Hey John

This function will generate FirebaseMessaging token and send it to the ChatGen.

You will receive notifications from Bot and Live Agent, when clicked on notification, you will be redirected to the respective conversation.

You won't receive notifications when you are in ChatWidget.
